1334800.name: Everything Explosive
1334800.description:
Battle Royale - By utilizing explosive weaponry, experiment with fun and unique ways of to achieve victory. Shops can be found across the main map and items can receive completely new versions through upgrades. Locations with low populations have chances of getting caught in a barren zones which can be avoided by fighting other players.

Castle Defense - As a defender, upgrade your castle and protect your shard vault from getting hijacked. As an attacker, upgrade your perks and be as stealthy as possible. Needs 2 or more players.

Capture the Flag - Two teams have bases that are rapidly depleting in fuel. Keep delivering the opposing team's flag in order to refuel your team's base. Once one base's fuel completely depletes the other team will attain victory.

Bomb Blowup - Two teams fight for three rounds to gain the most points in this dodgeball-style game mode. Collect ammo across the stadium in order to throw them bombs back at your opponents. you can propel bombs further by charging up your throw. Traps and powerups will also occasionally drop into the stadium to challenge each team.
1334800.supported_languages:
英语*, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙
*具有完全音频支持的语言
